story:
HELLO... BONJOUR, CIAO, NAMASTE & SALAAM!

We're Sojourn & Mia!

An aunt and niece duo made up of one half creative writer and the other half illustrator...and we have come together to bring you Every Girl, the world's first and only children's book to tell one story from every country in the world!

Every Girl is also unique because it's one of the few children's books that is an anthology as well as a memoir. This means each story is told from the child's perspective and each story stands completely on its own.

Since we began in July 2017, we've already printed and sold hundreds of our first edition - Every Girl in Beta: The first 10 nations; and been featured in major publications such as Bustle, Teen Vogue, NEXT magazine and Buzzfeed! 

By supporting Every Girl, you'll not only be getting an enchanting children's book full of charm and fascinating real world anecdotes, you'll also become part of a movement that has a message for the world: each of our individual stories matter, each girl should have a voice, and that we should not only appreciate, but also seek out the beauty and diversity in each person we encounter. 

Mia, Sojourn and the entire team (yes we are an entire community - check us out here) believe that by using the art of storytelling to speak directly to a child's curiosity, we can help foster a generation of children who embrace the 'other', celebrate the vastness of our differences and learn early that mankind is at its best when we work and learn together!

Funds from this campaign will go towards 

  • £1000  - Artists & Supplies (stylist, watercolor/paints, Adobe Draw Renewal License) 
  • £500    - Amazon Listing Services (SEO services)
  • £2000 - Printing & Shipping Rewards 
  • £2000 - Support Worker (Country Researcher & Support Journalist) 
  • £1000 - Copy Editing 

REWARDS 

Every Girl: The First Ten Nations. 

  • Africa: Ghana & Zimbabwe
  • The Middle East: Iran & Syria
  • Europe: France & Iceland
  • The Americas: Guatemala & México
  • Asia & The South Pacific: Indonesia & Kazakhstan  

Additional Rewards include: 

  • The Queens Who give Back Coloring Book: This coloring book includes stories of well known women who use their star power to make a positive impact on society!
  • Every Girl High Def Poster 
  • Every Girl Box: The Every Girl Beta box includes all the items above, as well as a pin "explorer" map to keep track of all the countries you have read, and a regional candy or sweet treat. 

The Impact We Can Make 

Reading as a tool for education, is often guided by a core message or lesson. Every Girl provides an inclusive variety of messages and lessons delivered through anecdotal experiences. These stories gently deconstruct the more significant events of a child’s life and through this two main things will happen:

  • Instead of feeling as though they are experiencing the world in an individual and potentially isolating way, the reader will feel a part of a global community of children who encounter similar life experiences
  • Children will be encouraged to think about the world beyond their immediate surroundings. This in turn encourages compassion and empathy; key tools for inclusive and enriching social interactions, and ultimately a more peaceful world.

Every Girl is Also a Social Enterprise! 

That means that 35% of profits from all future sales, will go to Salam U.K., our charitable partner working to promote equality for refugees, women and anyone facing issues of intolerance. 

Most Frequently Asked Question

Question : How do you find the women who tell their stories?

Our website is the short answer.

The long answer is, women go online and fill in this form. We then follow up with an interview. If the interview goes well, we write it into a children's story and include it into our archives. 

The biggest challenge we faced in the very beginning, was getting great stories from so many countries.

We worried that once we found the relevant women, would they be able to recall great stories from their childhood? How would we get them to tell their story honestly and authentically? How would we make the stories honest and interesting?

To overcome these challenges, we had to use the internet; social media to be specific; Hashtags have been key. For example #cameroonianwoman and #cameroonianqueen were both successful in helping us find two stories from Cameroon.

On our team is also  BBC correspondent Claire Read, who designed the framework we use to interview the women. Her work has been instrumental in helping us get the absolute best stories out of anyone and its not too often we walk away without a great story to tell! She's an absolute pro - check her out! 

We were also super lucky to get surges in interest after our media spotlights and write ups with NEXT and Bustle. Currently, we receive about 20 submissions of interest each week and only  require a handful of countries to make submissions (Tuvalu, North Korea and Papua New Guinea are of special interest at the moment). For women interested in being considered for the book, we encourage you to submit on our site! 

Other Ways You Can Help

Sometimes you just can't contribute money BUT there are other ways you can help us in reaching our goal! 

Here's how: 

  • By making an original post about our project with a link to our campaign included, you help us spread the word and get the message out about what we're doing.
  • Tell your friends, tell you teachers, your spouse or the lady in the line at the grocery store! I'm sure she'd love us if she knew about us! 
  • See an event you think Every Girl would be great for, either as a speaker or attendee? Hit us up at everygirl@salamuk.org! We would love to be involved in all things #girlpower, #diversity, #childrensbook and topics surrounding refugee welfare!
  • Refer a North Korean woman (defector) who wants to tell her story! We know it sounds a bit... what? But every country really means EVERY COUNTRY and we are on the lookout for hard to reach people. 

 

Bios

 

Sojourn Wallace is the creator and author of Every Girl. Originally from Lexington Kentucky, she has lived in seven countries worldwide and currently calls London, England home. Sojourn has a B.A. in Fine art and a M.A. in International Relations & Political Theory. Before starting Every Girl, Sojourn worked as a corporate executive at PricewaterhouseCoopers, on the international health strategy. Sojourn is also the co- founder of Salam U.K.  a medical charity that provides free treatment to refugees.

Mia Kealoha is an artist and 7th grade honor roll student from Lexington Kentucky. As well as being a skilled illustrator

Mia is also a classically trained gospel singer and was encouraged to illustrate Every Girl by her aunt Sojourn. She says she was nervous at first and although her aunt was a little hard on her about meeting deadlines, she says she always felt like she was valued and that her work  was appreciated by the entire team. At only twelve years old, she hopes one day she'll be able to write her own story and show others that age should never hold you back from your dreams.

"I think once people see that the quality didn't suffer because kids are illustrating it, there will be more opportunities for kids who work hard at their craft."
story_txt:
HELLO... BONJOUR, CIAO, NAMASTE & SALAAM!
We're Sojourn & Mia!
An aunt and niece duo made up of one half creative writer and the other half illustrator...and we have come together to bring you Every Girl, the world's first and only children's book to tell one story from every country in the world!
Every Girl is also unique because it's one of the few children's books that is an anthology as well as a memoir. This means each story is told from the child's perspective and each story stands completely on its own. 
Since we began in July 2017, we've already printed and sold hundreds of our first edition - Every Girl in Beta: The first 10 nations; and been featured in major publications such as Bustle, Teen Vogue, NEXT magazine and Buzzfeed! 
By supporting Every Girl, you'll not only be getting an enchanting children's book full of charm and fascinating real world anecdotes, you'll also become part of a movement that has a message for the world: each of our individual stories matter, each girl should have a voice, and that we should not only appreciate, but also seek out the beauty and diversity in each person we encounter. 
Mia, Sojourn and the entire team (yes we are an entire community - check us out here) believe that by using the art of storytelling to speak directly to a child's curiosity, we can help foster a generation of children who embrace the 'other', celebrate the vastness of our differences and learn early that mankind is at its best when we work and learn together!
Funds from this campaign will go towards 

£1000  - Artists & Supplies (stylist, watercolor/paints, Adobe Draw Renewal License) 

£500    - Amazon Listing Services (SEO services)
£2000 - Printing & Shipping Rewards 
£2000 - Support Worker (Country Researcher & Support Journalist) 
£1000 - Copy Editing 

REWARDS 

Every Girl: The First Ten Nations. 

Africa: Ghana & Zimbabwe
The Middle East: Iran & Syria
Europe: France & Iceland
The Americas: Guatemala & México
Asia & The South Pacific: Indonesia & Kazakhstan  

Additional Rewards include: 


The Queens Who give Back Coloring Book: This coloring book includes stories of well known women who use their star power to make a positive impact on society!

Every Girl High Def Poster 


Every Girl Box: The Every Girl Beta box includes all the items above, as well as a pin "explorer" map to keep track of all the countries you have read, and a regional candy or sweet treat. 

The Impact We Can Make 

Reading as a tool for education, is often guided by a core message or lesson. Every Girl provides an inclusive variety of messages and lessons delivered through anecdotal experiences. These stories gently deconstruct the more significant events of a child’s life and through this two main things will happen:

Instead of feeling as though they are experiencing the world in an individual and potentially isolating way, the reader will feel a part of a global community of children who encounter similar life experiences
Children will be encouraged to think about the world beyond their immediate surroundings. This in turn encourages compassion and empathy; key tools for inclusive and enriching social interactions, and ultimately a more peaceful world.

Every Girl is Also a Social Enterprise! 
That means that 35% of profits from all future sales, will go to Salam U.K., our charitable partner working to promote equality for refugees, women and anyone facing issues of intolerance.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Charles Champagne and I am the Founding Editor and Creative Director of Leur Magazine, an LGBTQIA+ Arts & Culture magazine based in Baton Rouge, La.  

I am a photographer from New Iberia, La. with 7 years of work experience in the fields of hospitality, marketing, advertising, production and photojournalism. 

Already having established ourselves with local design awards and new community relationships, I knew this was the perfect opportunity to reach out to our local community members and allow them to have a hand in our success. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are in the hopes of raising $7,000 in order to produce our upcoming biannual issues 04 and 05. Two-thirds of the funding will go to printing, where as the rest will be put toward providing production materials for our biggest annual event, ArtsFest.

ArtsFest is held at the Raising Canes River Center on June 16 as part of Baton Rouge Pride Festival. Local LGBTQIA+ artists and queer small business owners are invited to show off their products and works of art in a fun and creative atmosphere where ALL forms of art and ALL forms of identity are welcome.  

If we do not meet our goal of $7,000, those funds raised will still remain allocated to our printing budget, where we will then search internally on how to cover our differences in cost. 

 

The Impact

The impact of this fundraiser is providing validation, affirmation, and motivation for our local queer creative communities here in the South. Most people assume the queer community here in the Southern United States are quiet and live in the shadows, where in reality our local queer communities continue to thrive everyday. 

I believe that no matter the outcome of this campaign, we will continue to work hard to provide a space where local Southern queer creatives can find shelter in mentorship, find family in collaboration,  find passion in their art making, and most importantly find confidence in telling their story. 

We will continue to host local collaborative art events, provide a premium printed publication that praises Southern queer expression that also has an evolving and engaging digital presence. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot help us financially, please consider sharing this fundraiser on your personal social media pages, as well as via word of mouth to your friends and family. 

Don't forget, Indiegogo has some great and easy to use share tools!

story:
What are Probiotics?

Probiotics are live bacterial cultures that we consume in fermented foods. They're called "pro" because they're believed to be beneficial to our health.

"Years of antibiotic use (either by prescription drugs or by eating conventionally-raised meats), eating sugar-laden food, and eschewing microbe-feeding fibers are all making you fat—but not for the reason you think. This pattern of drug use and poor eating has also armed the bad bacteria who live in your gut with the weapons they need to overtake the good guys. And when your good gut bugs are depleted, they not only won't be able to fend off weight-inducing inflammation, they also can't help you keep your metabolism humming, your immune system healthy, and your mind keen." - Eat This, Not That!

By adding more probiotic foods into your diet, you could see all of the following health benefits:

  • Stronger immune system
  • Improved digestion
  • Increased energy from production of vitamin B12
  • Reduced cold and flu
  • Healing from leaky gut and inflammatory bowel disease
  • Weight loss

  • Better breath because probiotics destroy candida

 

                                                   

Probiotic Health Related Children's Books

We are creating Children's Books that discuss fermented probiotic foods such as Kefir, Kvass, and Sauerkraut. We believe that these are foods that should be a part of a regular healthy diet and that introducing healthy eating habits at an early age can establish a lifetime of wellness. 

Our first Children's Board Book that we created is filled with probiotic terms to start familiarizing your toddler with. It covers Kefir, Kombucha, Kvass, Pickles, Sourdough, and Sauerkraut which has never been done before... till now.

Written by Carmela Cirilli founder and main Fermentista at The Cultured Club. She creates traditional fermented foods and offers private events and workshops.

The artwork and layout of the book was created by Tim Mattson. The illustrations were created using a minimal pop art styling along with colors that are sure to capture your child's attention. More importantly it will introduce fermented probiotic foods to your child.

                                           

                                           Art from one of the Board Book pages.

Here is How Our Campaign Works

We're dedicated to spreading information about the benefits of traditional fermented probiotic foods. We are donating our time to the creation of the book with all funding going towards just the printing of the book.

When you buy a book in advance and that will help us cover the costs of printing the board book. We're in need of $2500 to cover the first board book and every penny raised will go towards that end. 

If we can raise the funds we need by November 30th we'll be able to have the books made in time for the holidays. It will make a perfect GIFT for any family looking to give their child, relative, or friend a healthy head start.

The Board Books will be sold for $7 (MSRP) but if you support us today you can save $1 or more. 

Buy ONE board book in advance and Save $1.                                                                                              Buy TWO or more and Save $2 on each book.

PERKS:

  • ONE Board Book $6
  • TWO or more Board Books $5 each
  • Additional funding support earns Mrs. Grossman's Stickers & Thank You list
  • 25 or more Wholesale Pricing

If you give $1 or more than the cost of the book we'll add you to our "Thank You" list of supporters on the book's official website. We will also include Mrs. Grossman's Stickers that will be shipped with your book.

We offer a wholesale option for those that have a Book Store, Yoga Studio, or Doctors Office. Get 25 Books or more starting at $4 each.

BULK PERKS:

  • 25-Books $100 ($4.00 each)
  • 50-Books $175 ($3.50 each)
  • 100-Books $300 ($3.00 each)

The total we need for the first 500 Board Books is $2500. This total covers the cost of ISBN registration and printing. Each book sold in advance gets us closer to reaching our goal and making our book a reality. The $2500 does not cover our time for creating the board book. We hope to eventually sell enough that we can print more and make a little money for our time spent in making the book. Again, what's most important to us is getting the information out to children for a healthier head start in life.

  • Total funding needed for 500 Board Books $2500
  • Save money by pre-ordering in advance
  • By pre-ordering your supporting the book Authors directly 
  • If we do not reach our goal we'll find an interested VC who'll help us for a cut

Healthy Impact

Help us spread good health practices to others starting at early childhood.

With a balanced diet that contains traditional fermented foods and exercise human beings can take back control of their health. Spread awareness of these vital health practices to your community through early education. 

  • Today more than ever Children need a healthy head start
  • Healthy lifestyles begin in childhood

Getting Up The Hill

"Yummy For Our Tummy" is Written by Carmela Cirilli and Illustrated by Tim Mattson a husband and wife dynamic duo focused on making the book a reality and Getting Up The Hill.

We're 100% dedicated to propagating the importance of a healthy diet that includes traditional fermented probiotic foods. We value your support and ask that you share our campaign with all of your friends and family.

  • NYC Fermentista teacher, fermenter, and researcher
  • Award Winning Illustrator

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute funds. That's okay, but that doesn't mean you can't help. Simply share our campaign with your friends, family, or co-workers. Social media makes it easy to contribute!

  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

THANK YOU for your support!

story:
What is this doggo guide?

In the US and UK combined, there are almost 80,000,000 pet dogs. That's 320 million paws bounding around our homes and hearts.

It's a wonder then, that getting a new dog is still fraught with so much confusion. 

How can it be that with this many dog owners, there's no single source of truth about how to raise your first doggo right?

From the many myths and legends about what you should and shouldn’t do, to the insane amount of information online - it's impossible to know where to begin. Seriously. You need anti-acids to get through it. It's nerve-wracking.

When I finally got through that quagmire after getting my own first doggo, I decided enough was enough. So over several months, I wrote the guide that I wish I'd had.

The result is 100+ pages of simple, accessible, up-to-date information to get you off to the best start with your new pupper.

From deciding which breed to get, right through to the one year boosters, you'll have all the information you need to get through every major milestone, stress-free.

The chapters in the book follow your pup from before they are born, right through to their 2nd birthday. The aim is to walk you through all the stages of your dogs development as they happen, in real-time (something I wish I'd been able to access.)

I've written the guide. Now I need your help to bring it to life!


I'm raising $3000 to design, brand and print an initial batch of my guide. By backing this campaign, you'll not only be making my dog Phoebe very happy (10 minutes of uninterrupted belly rubs for every $10 raised...), but you'll also be supporting first time dog owners everywhere. And that just makes you awesome.

So 3...2....1....Go back the campaign now! 

 

Why am I doing this?

My name’s Dani, and in late 2017 I got my very first dog - Phoebe. She is a dachshund-shih tzu-lhasa apso cross, and the absolute centre of my universe.

When I got her, I thought it would be a walk in the park. I love dogs and have lots of experience with them, so surely having my own would be easy... right? 

Wrong. 

It was so much harder than I expected. For the first 4 months, I was sleep deprived and anxious all the time. And I realised that the root of that anxiety was that I really just couldn’t find a conclusive source of information to know what what was normal, and what wasn’t. The more I read, the more confused I got.

So one day, as I cycled to work, thinking about some element of Phoebe’s general health and wellbeing as per usual, I decided to create the guide I wish I’d had.

And so I did.

The result is 100+ pages of absolutely everything that I could think of that any first time dog owner would need to know. 

My hope is that by reading this, you have the support you need to make the many decisions that face you over the first 12-24 months of your doggo's life.

I’ve purposefully left out medical related information from the guide - after all I’m not a vet and this guide should never substitute advice from a professional. But everything else in here should be a great point to help you navigate your way through this grand adventure.

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

I’m trying to raise a minimum of $3000 to fund the cost of getting my ebook professionally designed and printed in an initial batch of 50 books.

My unique perks include:

  • A shoutout in the guide
  • A copy of the ebook today!
  • Thank you videos from Phoebe (the muse of the book)
  • A one-of-a kind canvas bag

I've written this as a guide for millenials. I use words like doge, and pupper, and floof, because I was so sick and tired of reading material from the early 90s when I needed accessible information. But getting the visual brand right is a fine balance, so I will work with a branding specialist to do this.

I plan to do an initial print run of 50 copies, which will help me to guage the appetite for physical books and to test out more scaleable models of printing. I can get each book printed for around $10-15, and with shipping on top, I will be able to comfortable get the first 50 printed within the $3000 target (after the design spend).

What is this doggo guide?
In the US and UK combined, there are almost 80,000,000 pet dogs. That's 320 million paws bounding around our homes and hearts.
It's a wonder then, that getting a new dog is still fraught with so much confusion. 
How can it be that with this many dog owners, there's no single source of truth about how to raise your first doggo right?
From the many myths and legends about what you should and shouldn’t do, to the insane amount of information online - it's impossible to know where to begin. Seriously. You need anti-acids to get through it. It's nerve-wracking.
When I finally got through that quagmire after getting my own first doggo, I decided enough was enough. So over several months, I wrote the guide that I wish I'd had.
The result is 100+ pages of simple, accessible, up-to-date information to get you off to the best start with your new pupper.
From deciding which breed to get, right through to the one year boosters, you'll have all the information you need to get through every major milestone, stress-free.
The chapters in the book follow your pup from before they are born, right through to their 2nd birthday. The aim is to walk you through all the stages of your dogs development as they happen, in real-time (something I wish I'd been able to access.)
I've written the guide. Now I need your help to bring it to life!
I'm raising $3000 to design, brand and print an initial batch of my guide. By backing this campaign, you'll not only be making my dog Phoebe very happy (10 minutes of uninterrupted belly rubs for every $10 raised...), but you'll also be supporting first time dog owners everywhere. And that just makes you awesome.
So 3...2....1....Go back the campaign now! 

 
Why am I doing this?
My name’s Dani, and in late 2017 I got my very first dog - Phoebe. She is a dachshund-shih tzu-lhasa apso cross, and the absolute centre of my universe.
When I got her, I thought it would be a walk in the park. I love dogs and have lots of experience with them, so surely having my own would be easy... right? 
Wrong. 
It was so much harder than I expected. For the first 4 months, I was sleep deprived and anxious all the time. And I realised that the root of that anxiety was that I really just couldn’t find a conclusive source of information to know what what was normal, and what wasn’t. The more I read, the more confused I got.
So one day, as I cycled to work, thinking about some element of Phoebe’s general health and wellbeing as per usual, I decided to create the guide I wish I’d had.
And so I did.
The result is 100+ pages of absolutely everything that I could think of that any first time dog owner would need to know. 
My hope is that by reading this, you have the support you need to make the many decisions that face you over the first 12-24 months of your doggo's life.I’ve purposefully left out medical related information from the guide - after all I’m not a vet and this guide should never substitute advice from a professional. But everything else in here should be a great point to help you navigate your way through this grand adventure.

story:
I've always wanted to write my own kind of fairy tale, one where the main protagonist was feisty, determined, and relatable. I also wanted to explore the rich Inca culture and its interesting mythology. Kutu, the tiny Inca Princess is a project that has allowed me to do all that, and now I'm ready to share it with the world!

I visited Cusco for the first time when I was ten-years old. I immediately fell in love with that amazing city of contrasts, history, and vibrant culture. Thankfully, my journey as a writer has taken me to that dreamy place once again. I'm a Peruvian born writer currently living in Oklahoma, USA. I have published eight children's books and in many of them I explore my roots and heritage. My books are also available in Spanish.

Kutu is a bilingual story, in English and Spanish. It also features phrases in Quechua thanks to the kind contribution of Sindi Haro, a Peruvian linguist who is bilingual in Spanish and Quechua.

For me it was important that all participants in this project shared the cultural pride in our ancient Peruvian culture, that's why I asked the talented scenic designer and friend, Uldarico Sarmiento Ossio to jump on board. He is illustrating Kutu, and what a great job he's done so far!

With your help and support I will be able to pay for illustrations and the initial print run of the book in hardcover (500 copies).

If we exceed our goal, I will use those funds to translate this book completely in Quechua (along with the English or Spanish version), and make sure its hero, the valiant KUTU flies to Cusco . I want the children of Cusco and other Andean cities to feel PROUD of having a character that represents them and validates their language.

My passion is to bring quality children's literature to our children's hands. Books that are empowering, diverse and multicultural, just like the world we live in now.

THANK YOU for believing in Kutu, in me, and in Uldarico.

 

For more news visit me on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/purplecornpressbooks/

or my website: www.marianallanos.com 

See Uldarico's work at www.uldaricodesign.com

Please SHARE, SHARE, AND SHARE this campaign!

story:
Quick Summary

First things first: Yes, we did it! We have just funded our KICKSTARTER campaign successfully and are in the process of sending our magazine to print! Now we are offering everybody a chance to preorder this extraordinary collector's issue through our new INDIEGOGO INDEMAND campaign!

About Us

We are an independent publishing house, based in Vienna, Austria specialising in high quality collector's issues on rock's biggest acts: Since 2009, we have published German language "Rock Classics" issues (journalistic projects of unofficial nature) about the likes of AC/DC, LED ZEPPELIN, PINK FLOYD, METALLICA, GUNS N' ROSES, KISS and QUEEN (and many more...). This QUEEN issue will be our first to be translated into English and fully updated to include additional original features, adding extra value and making this collector's issue available to fans worldwide for the first time. With the world in lockdown, the time is right to offer a bit of distraction and joy to music fans worldwide, and what better subject to lighten the mood, ease the mind, and enjoy the moment than QUEEN? Aside from this, you would be supporting independent music journalism and magazine publishing.

A Brief Overview Of Content 

The magazine features the history, discography and biographies of the band, as well as film, book, memorabilia sections and special features. Several interviews and many rare photos are also included.

Take a peek: 

What We Need & What You Get

We have already funded the project through a first successful campaign but there is still a chance to preorder the magazine at this stage through this INDIEGOGO INDEMAND campaign - you have the choice between a single magazine or several packages including cool merch!

Check it out:

 

 

The Impact

We are an independent music magazine publisher from Vienna/Austria - being around since 1995 we have experienced a severe challenge through the ongoing Covid-19 crisis. Trying to be less dependent on advertising revenue we have decided to take our successful collector's series global. You will help us bringing this series of collector's magazines to a new level and making it available to an audience worldwide for the first time. Thanks for joining us on this journey!

Risks & Challenges

We have decades of publishing experience in publishing magazines, so we expect the delivery in time, but unforeseen challenges or delays due to the ongoing Corona-crisis can not be totally ruled out, e.g., if postal service restrictions continue unexpectedly for a longer time period. Even then, delivery later than September 2020 is unlikely and your order is likely to arrive much earlier. Another minor issue is the fact that depending on the value of the goodie package you choose, you may be asked to pay import duty if you live outside the European Union. Import duty is highly unlikely to be imposed on a single magazine itself, however.

Other Ways You Can Help

We would simply appreciate it if you spread the word, especially if you know some QUEEN fans or people who want to support independent music journalism. Any additional social media presence is extremely helpful, thank you!

Please note, that is a purely journalistic project and not officially affiliated or endorsed by the band or its management.

story:
Информация на РУССКОМ языке находится ЗДЕСЬ

For orders of 6 books or more, to make a customized order, or if you prefer to make a contribution without ordering a book, please contact me directly at barzuworld@gmail.com.

To pay by PayPal option, please, contact me at barzuworld@gmail.com

My website: https://marinaabrams.com/

 

  • Family reading time;
  • Reading in Russian or English for bilingual families;
  • A gift (kids love big books);
  • Reading at daycare. Some daycares allow parents to come and read books or organize activities as a way to celebrate their child's birthday. Our book is a perfect choice for that!
  • Demonstration at the school's International Day;
  • School project on Central Asia;
  • Theatrical performance at local community center, studio, or art school.    

  • Hardcover and good quality paper.
  • The size of the book will be 12x11 inches/31x28cm (Kids love huge books!).
  •  Large font for easy reading.
  • 34 beautiful illustrations (double-page spread) by Farrukh Negmatzade.
  • 96 pages.

"A long, long time ago, in a place where great roads crossed, stood the City of Blue Domes. The city was full of narrow, winding streets and intricate mosaics on the walls of its high towers. Many different kinds of people lived there - traders and craftsmen, musicians and dancers, the rich and the poor - and everyone spoke two or three languages so they could understand one another and live together in peace and harmony.

The city was famous for its bazaars – marketplaces, where everybody sold and bought goods. Oh, and what you could not find there, among the stalls! Sweet and juicy fruits, crisp vegetables, clay pots, expensive jewelry, boots, the finest, dyed silks, handmade carpets, rare books – everything your heart could desire!"

"And so, one day a merchant named Fayeez departed with his caravan to far-off Hindustan, the land of rich maharajas, from where he always brought spices and medicines, pearls, precious stones and fabulous fabrics. For several months he would travel overland, trudging through the deserts and hills with his caravan of camels, his faithful helpers, and brave horsemen. Arriving in the City of the Sun, in the land of Marwar, Fayeez immediately went to the fortress, which towered over a high cliff of red rock, and where the local ruler, maharaja Sardar, was always ready to welcome merchants."

Children 3 - 12 years old. My goal has been to make this book interesting and understandable not only for children of all ages, but also for their parents. Thus, the book is divided into several parts: the story itself, which includes history and fable; folkloric narrative on how people really live; and an educational section at the end of the story for parents to discuss with their children.

"The servants opened the chest and withdrew from it round loaves of bread that Fayeez brought from the City of Blue Domes. Over the six months that they sat in the chest, their crusts had become stale and hard.

Taking them into his hands, the maharaja roared with displeasure: “What is this? What are these rocks you have brought me, Merchant Fayeez?”

“This is bread from my city,” said Fayeez with pride. “There is no such bread anywhere in the world!”

“Are you playing a trick on me?!” the Maharaja growled, his brow knit in anger. “On such bread as this you would have me break my teeth!”

“Do not be angry, your Highness. For these are loaves of the most unusual bread.”

The main incentive for creating this book was the birth of my children. All parents want to share our sense of the world with our children, and instill in them a love for those things that we love, ourselves. And what do I love? To read and to travel! To learn about other cultures, about the history of far-off lands, and to make new friends.

My life is closely tied to Central Asia. I was born and spent my childhood in a small Uighur town on the border between Kazakhstan and China. My early years were much like Barzu’s - many women there baked bread in special clay ovens, called tanoors; my sister and I played with real clay from the ground and not plasticine; donkeys grazed through the streets; and fruits and berries ripened on the trees in our and our neighbors’ yards. Much later, after I had received my graduate degree, I spent a year in Tajikistan and that country, with its magnificent mountains and welcoming culture, has stayed in my heart ever since. I gained many good friends there, who remain so to this day.

I was surprised to find that there are very few books for children on Central Asia, in particular for pre-school children. After all, Central Asia is a region with over 100 ethnic groups, the land of the Great Silk Road, where Alexander the Great left his footprints, the old empires of Genghis Khan and Tamerlane!

One day some time ago, my husband brought several souvenir mugs back from a business trip to Tajikistan, which were decorated with illustrations by our friend, the artist Farrukh Negmatzade. The images on the mugs were so compelling that I immediately began to imagine stories for each of them, which I told to my children. Thus, was born the idea to create a series of books about the Tajik boy, Barzu. My hope is that, through these books, young readers will become familiar not just with the culture of the Tajik people, but gradually learn about many other nationalities from Central Asia.

I have been working for the past year on this rather unique book. During this time, I barraged my friends in Tajikistan and Uzbekistan with hundreds of questions, corresponded with experts and historians, flew to the region in person and personally visited tanoor workshops, and read through a lot of historical and ethnographic literature.

And, of course, I consider it a privilege that, despite all the demands on his time, the great Farrukh-Aka (Uncle Farrukh) agreed to illustrate this book!  Who else could portray all the charm of Tajik life with such poignancy and detail, except an artist living and breathing his native, Tajik land? 

Irina from Boston, mother of two boys Petya (age 6) and Misha (age 4)

My kids love to look in detail at the pictures and match them with the story and ask questions. We all liked the book. We had to find Tajikistan on the globe. The kids were fascinated with the new words like "tanoor" and "kishlak," and names of people that do not sound like what they are used to. They were curious about tanoor, the peculiar way it looks and the way the dough is placed inside of it to make bread. The big hit was the chapter “Orange Roofs.” My boys were surprised to learn that people dry apricots on the roof under the sun and that they turn into "kuraga" which I often pack for them as a snack. They also liked the way Barzu solved the problem for the girls who did not know how to share the strings.

As a parent I appreciated many opportunities to expand beyond the story. Like trying to find the country on the map. Telling about the different lifestyle people have. When they have to be more self reliant and closer to nature, like making ovens and baking bread from scratch. It is a big difference with our hectic lives and frozen food from supermarket. We spread dried apricots on the table and imagined the orange roofs of the houses in kishlak.

Natalia Mironova, currently lives in California

The story flows like an oriental pattern. Very simple language creates vivid and memorable images of mountains, the blue sky, ancient traditions, an old sun-lit city with roofs covered by orange apricots. We enter the wonderful world of a clever Tajik boy, hardworking and curious, who travels by bicycle to his grandmother. Together with him we discover his grandmother's secrets and the eternal wisdom of Central Asian life and folklore. This is a very good book. As the grandmother of three grandchildren, I am glad of this book’s appearance and, undoubtedly, the emergence of a new author.

Marina Abrams – Author of “Orange and Blue: The World of Barzu” and the pending book series,The World of Barzu; project director and founder of “Barzu World.” I was born and raised in Kazakhstan. I consider my high-school years the most formative for my writing skills, where I studied Russian language and literature at Specialized School #134, in Almaty. I then enrolled into the Translation-Interpretation Department at the Abylaikhan Kazakh State University of International Relations and World Languages, where in addition to English, I studied Chinese and Spanish. I received my M.A. in International Policy Studies at Monterey Institute of International Studies (now the Middlebury Institute of International Studies at Monterey) in California.

Farrukh Negmatzade – Illustrator of “Orange and Blue: The World of Barzu;” and a well-known, contemporary artist of Tajikistan. We met in 2005, when I lived in Dushanbe, Tajikistan. In fact, we were neighbors and have become very good friends ever since. He is the father of three children and four grandchildren. Farrukh Negmatzade graduated from Moscow Art School under the Academy of Arts of USSR, and in 1982 graduated from Moscow Surikov State Art Institute. More information about Farrukh Negmat-Zade at www.http://farrukhnegmatzade.com/

Joshua Abrams – translator from Russian into English. My husband, a wonderful father to my children, and a talented writer. Joshua studied Russian in St Petersburg, was a Peace Corps Volunteer in Kazakhstan, and has lived and worked in most of the countries of the former Soviet Union. He’s a graduate of Bard College (BA) and Indiana University (MPA/MA) and has also published his own articles and stories. Most importantly, my husband was the one who brought me to Tajikistan! 

Jonah Abrams (Age 5) and Annabelle Abrams (Age 2). My children, they are my first audience and contributors into my every day creative process. And they are waiting for this book impatiently

Natalia Kuzmina – Russian language copy editor. Natalia is a graduate of the Philology Department at Novosibirsk State University, Russia. From 1993 to 1996 Natalia and I studied together in the Philology Group at Specialized High School #134 in Almaty, Kazakhstan. And now, 20 years later we are happy to work together in this project. Thanks to her, all comas will be in the right place. Most important, Natalia is a mother of three wonderful boys - Maxim (8 y.o.), Alexander (3 y.o.) and Nicholas (18 months).

AUGUST-SEPTEMBER-OCTOBER: Prepare E-color book. Send out E-color books by e-mail and other rewards, if they were not ordered together with the book. Finalize electronic version of the hardcover book “Orange and Blue: The World of Barzu” for printing. Print the hardcover book.

NOVEMBER: Ship hardcover books and other rewards. The book is in your hands for wonderful fall reading at home and at school!

NOVEMBER: Start delivering the Eastern Tale reward.

Due to our successful campaign on Kickstarter thousands of children around the world will soon read the first book about Barzu. I also have two more books in line for final editing and illustration, which will make them a series called The World of Barzu.

Photo by Yuri Shurmistov

Photo by Yuri Shurmistov

A proven goal-setting, planning, and productivity system for You. Make 2021 your best year yet.

 

 

What is Achiever Planner?

Achiever Planner is a multifold Undated all-in-one planner designed specifically to address and focus on all the areas of day-to-day life and meticulously plan future goals through Monthly Goal set up and mind mapping. The planner has been particularly designed to stay focused on various aspects of your daily life, be it your budget or fitness goal, or pensive thoughts.

Why Now?

2020 has been an incredible ride for all of us. We've seen the entire world come to its knees before a pandemic; we've seen economies crash; we've lost our loved ones; we've lost our jobs, our goals, and our plans. But what matters more is that we've survived; we've fought all the battles and are still standing strong; we are loving more, and we are ready to take on the world once again.

Achiever planner is for all of us who believe, who fight, who keep standing. This planner is a perfect way to leave behind all that 2020 and COVID-19 had to offer and move on. We believe in New Beginnings. We believe in Hope. And we do believe in our Strength to Fight Back.

Specs:

  • Dimensions: A5 size, 5.8" x 8.3" x 0.9"
  • Weight: Around 1 pound
  • Durable and soft PU leather cover
  • High-quality bleed resistant 120 GSM paper
  • Creative front quality elastic mobile pocket & pen loop
  • Elastic band enclosure
  • Subtly debossed logo
  • Printed on sustainably sourced and recyclable paper
  • Designed with rounded edges
  • Strong back-pocket
  • Available in a variety of colorways ( Kickstarter-exclusive Limited Edition Sets)

 

What's Inside:

 01. BODY MEASUREMENTS  & TRACKER: Check your daily/weekly body measurement and track it. You can keep track of your weight, bicep, waist, or any of your concerned body parts. The tracker is not labeled so you can use it as per your needs.

02. TRAVEL PLANNER: You can keep track of all the places that you've visited or you would like to go to. Travels and Trips make life fun and adventurous and sometimes give a much-needed break from routine life.

03. HEALTH VITAMINS/MINERALS: They say that the biggest wealth one can own is one's health. And being healthy is more necessary now than ever. Our well-curated Health Guide contains all the necessary nutrients required for our body, their function, and their sources.

04. STAY MOTIVATED: When the going gets tough, the tough get going. It's alright to feel low sometimes. We all do. Our set of quotes from some of the world's best achievers will give you the much-needed boost. Inspirational quotes and a proper self-tracking process will give you the energy that you need to get going and work towards your goals.

05. GANTT CHART MANAGEMENT: Gantt Charts help you to properly plan and execute your tasks and projects. You can make your own projects' Gantt chart for tracking your Individual tasks, length of time, real completion time, planning time, keep in-line project schedule, etc.

06. FINANCE TRACKING: Keeping a balanced budget can help you to stay on track and sleep better at night. Track your finance by adding up all your accounts, and outlining budget and savings goals.

07. FUTURE GOAL MIND MAPPING: Visualise your future and career and get focused to achieve that.

08. MONTHLY GOAL SETTING: Rome was not built in a day, neither are you. A step-by-step process of setting goals, tracking progress, and reflecting on what went wrong. Visualize your monthly goal and to-do lists and task plan your valuable time for the entire month.

09. HABITS TRACKER: Track your old and new habits easily. This renders you regular and achievable focus on each task. Getting comfortable with discomfort is crucial to success. Give yourself a 30-day challenge every month (with WEEKLY PLANNER) and come closer to your goal.

10. MONTHLY TASK MIND MAPPING: Visualise your monthly task, to-do lists, and plan your time for the entire month.

11. WEEKLY PLANNER: Weekly overviews allow you to track your weekly schedule and you can keep your daily activities more focused and more productive.

12. SELF REFLECTION: Ensure you stay connected with yourself for self-reflection. It’s essential to find what you think and how you can be better every time.

13. Undated Planner / 2021 Planner: It's an undated planner so you can use it as a 2021 planner or for any other year or month. Thus, you will be able to get the maximum out of your planner without wasting a single page.

 

How to use Achiever planner

Multifunctional A5 Notebook Organizer with Wireless Charger + 8000mAh Power Bank

story:
Hi-ho, Bystanderisti! As the planet cooks and our Republic heaves, attempting to throw up the foreign object forced down its throat last November  — we're back again, with another heaping helping of humor writing and cartoonery. 

The idea behind Bystander is simple: gather a bunch of super-funny folks from places like The Simpsons, SNL, The New Yorker and so on, and print stuff they can't do for The Simpsons, SNL, The New Yorker and so on. Then put it all together in a nice-looking book that feels just like the beloved humor magazines of the past — The National Lampoon, SPY, PUNCH, and so on. This scheme has proved to be a huge success, as you can read here and here. If you crave yet more details, please go to our website.

In a time where intelligent satire is more important than ever, The American Bystander is the first successful print humor magazine in the United States in 20 years. American corporate publishing is simply not equipped to produce this type of content — so we're turning to readers. And readers have responded, pledging over $160,000 to our crowdfunding campaigns.

 (Some of) THE PEOPLE IN #5: Cover by Jack Ziegler; Merrill Markoe, Ed Subitzky, Drew Friedman, Scott Dikkers, Liana Finck, Jack Handey, Brian McConnachie, Sam Gross, MK Brown, Howard Cruse, Todd Hanson, Mike Sacks, Steve Young... and many more! (We're not kidding. There's a TON of stuff in every issue.)

 

 

Your Bystanders are, as ever: 

Michael Gerber (Editor & Publisher): The American Bystander is the culmination of over 25 years as a writer, editor, and magazine consultant specializing in humor. I've written for The New Yorker, SNL, and many other places; my books have sold 1.25 million copies in 25 languages. In 2003, Barry Trotter and the Shameless Parody fried the brains of a generation of English tweens, and now we have Brexit. Sorry.

Brian McConnachie (Head Writer): Brian began his comedy career as an editor at The National Lampoon and the Lampoon's "Radio Hour." From there, he went to Saturday Night Live, and SCTV, completing the Holy Trinity of Seventies comedy. In the 80s and 90s, Brian amassed the coolest bunch of cameos in the history of cinema. In more recent years, he has written for The Simpsons and recorded pieces for NPR.

Alan Goldberg (Senior Editor): has been making non-fiction television and radio for more than 35 years. His work includes biographies ranging from Fidel Castro to the Beatles; science programs with Dr. Richard Leakey; programs on drugs and epidemic diseases; histories of American railroads, diners, The Forbidden City and the Golden Gate Bridge -- and even live rock and roll and gospel concerts. Alan will be overseeing Bystander's podcasts and live-event programming.

story:
Hola, mi nombre es Volmer Pinzon, soy Colombiano y nací y crecí en Bogotá, DC; Hasta ahora me he dedicado a la seguridad electrónica, siempre con el deseo de convertirme en inventor, y hacer realidad tantos dibujos que tengo en mi mente, que bien podrían ser llamados sueños. A partir del 15 de Enero del año 2015, y gracias al apoyo de la Super Intendencia de Industria y Comercio, empece a cristalizar mi ambición, al recibir mi primera patente de invención, bajo la resolucion 610 de la SIC.

Con esta idea patentada, me dedique a proyectar su aplicacion real en el mundo, y el proyecto que resulto gracias a la colaboracion de innumerables personas y organizaciones comprometidas unas con el medioambiente y otras con el desarrollo social, responde a un problema urgente que tenemos en nuestra ciudad, y que se presenta en casi cualquier ciudad o región moderna que este densamente poblada, que es la disposición final de las llantas usadas, ya sea de vehiculos domesticos, de vehiculos comerciales o las especiales usadas en agricultura, aviacion o mineria.

Lamentablemente, en Bogotá el problema es tan grave, que ya se han producido incendios de grandes magnitudes debido al manejo inadecuado de los residuos por parte de una empresa que se comprometio y no cumplio, causando ademas de la emergencia ambiental un rechazo por parte de cualquier organizacion a tomar cartas en el asunto, para evitar responsabilidades dificiles de asumir. El resultado es que ahora las llantas se acumulan en esquinas, andenes, canales y demas zonas comunes de la ciudad, porque es prohibida su disposicion final en rellenos sanitarios.


La solución hasta ahora la han aportado empresas privadas, ofreciendo soluciones de triturado de caucho, el cual es normalmente utilizado en proyectos arquitectónicos. Por ley, cada obra de pavimentación nueva debe incluir un 20% de triturado recuperado de llantas por volumen mezclado con el asfalto. El problema, es que el mercado local se acerca a la saturacion, y las exportaciones no son suficientes para que la demanda por estos productos triturados se equilibre con el exceso de oferta de las llantas en desuso.

Aquí entro yo, ofreciendo una nueva solución que complementara el mercado, y ampliara la mezcla de ofertas tanto de fuentes de energia, como de opciones de reciclado o reutilizacion y disposicion final de residuos solidos especiales y/o pleigrosos. Al ofrecer una opción valida a los generadores, usuarios y monta-llantas, es posible comprometer a los demás protagonistas en esta problemática, para que integren las cadenas de gestión del distrito. Esta solución no se enfrenta a saturacion del mercado, ya que el principal producto en oferta es energia electrica, que en una economia en desarrollo, siempre esta en alta demanda.

Por medio del proceso realizado en los reactores patentados, se descompone la estructura quimica de las llantas usadas y es transformada en un combustible gaseoso que es de inmediato transformado en energia electrica, por medio de avanzados equipos comerciales de generacion de potencia, desarrollados por un reconocido fabricante a nivel mundial; De este proceso se generan subproductos de carbono en estado solido, que son procesados para ser puestos en el mercado como materia prima para la industria.

Ahora es el momento de hacer grandes cosas con la ayuda de todos! Esta campaña me va a permitir construir los prototipos, la planta piloto y realizar la primera implementacion de un proyecto Waste-To-Power; Por eso, esta campaña se debe desarrollar en tres etapas, y contando con el apoyo tecnico y el financiamiento ofrecido por el proveedor, al final de la tercera etapa debemos haber logrado encontrar tantos colaboradores y tan comprometidos, que podamos hacer realidad esta empresa.


Etapa I - Reactor PANCHA V3

Hace décadas existe el concepto de pirolisis y es ampliamente utilizado sobretodo en la industria alimenticia; Varias empresas intentaron proponer modelos productivos empleando la pirolisis para obtener energéticos y materias primas a partir de materiales vulcanizados, específicamente llantas usadas, durante la década de los 70’s sin mayor éxito.  Actualmente, el grave problema social y ambiental que supone la disposición final de llantas ha renovado el interés de un pequeño sector de la industria en este nicho de mercado, y fabricantes Chinos se pusieron a la labor de resucitar antiguos diseños Japoneses caídos en abandono o cuyas patentes expiraron, para ofrecer plantas integrales para la pirolisis que aunque relativamente funcionales, son absolutamente obsoletas.

Este diseño se aprovecha de las particularidades físicas de la materia prima, específicamente su capacidad de absorber energía radiante o índice de emisividad; Utilizamos energía radiante infrarroja para inteligentemente bombardear las moléculas de hidro-carbones presentes en las llantas desechadas y precipitar el proceso de pirolisis en mucho menor tiempo, con un manejo inteligente y eficiente de la energía, completamente eléctrico, sin combustión de energéticos fósiles o del gas sintético obtenido. Los reactores diseñados por nosotros no requieren de cámara de pre-combustión, blowers, etc. Su aislamiento refractario es liviano, pues aprovechando la diferencia en emisividad entre la materia prima y el contenedor de la cámara de reacción se minimizan las fugas de energía térmica por conducción y/o convección.

De construcción liviana, y sin partes internas móviles, también ofrece flexibilidad superior frente a los diseños tradicionales, pues puede operar en atmósfera negativa o positiva, con diferentes medios oxidantes o inertes, permite la inyección de vapor para inducir perfiles de extrusión en moléculas de carbón activado, etc.

He construido un prototipo a escala de la última revisión de diseño (PANCHA3) y realizado pruebas de operación simples que demuestran la aplicación práctica del concepto.

Cada reactor o gasificador PANCHA3 tiene un consumo eléctrico de 18KWh, el planteamiento es modular, cada unidad procesa independientemente una tonelada de materia prima y pueden combinarse cuantas unidades se requieran.

 Actualmente el diseño de los reactores PANCHA3 y de la planta PIARS, así como los procedimientos de operación asociados a esta tecnología de pirolisis por medio de energía radiante IR cuentan con protección de la propiedad intelectual bajo la modalidad de patente de invención, bajo la jurisdicción de la SIC en Colombia y modelo PCT Internacional, con referencia Resolución 610 del 15 de Enero de 2015. 


Etapa II - Planta piloto, Balsillas

Adelantándome al éxito por alcanzar en la primera etapa, quiero mencionar las principales características en cada una de las siguientes etapas; La construcción de la planta piloto para la recepción y disposición final de residuos sólidos especiales y/o peligrosos esta enmarcada dentro de las siguientes características:

Ubicación geográfica: Balsillas - Zabrizky, Cundinamarca, Colombia.


Localizada en una zona de alto impacto, con uso industrial permitido, y otras empresas dedicadas a la disposición final en el sector, así como los rellenos sanitarios de Mondoñedo, esta ubicación es ideal para la construcción de nuestra planta piloto de tratamiento de residuos y generación/distribución eléctrica.

La construcción de líneas adicionales de 500KV como Bacata – Ancon sur y la reconfiguración de líneas como  Bacata – Mosquera o Mosquera – Nueva Esperanza asegura una infraestructura solida que facilite la comercialización y distribución de la energía producida.

La importancia de los planes de ampliación del Sistema de Transmisión Nacional está relacionada fuertemente con compromisos a largo plazo que el país ha adquirido por medio de acuerdos internacionales, y responde también a la agenda de impulso y desarrollo del gobierno nacional, por lo que se espera estabilidad y apoyo intersectorial que favorezca la implementación a larga escala y a largo plazo de estas soluciones, además de un gran potencial de replicar en diferentes mercados el impacto obtenido.

Estudio EEB 2012 - 2017

Estudio Distasa (Tasajero) 2012 - 2017

La adquisición de superficie para las operaciones de la planta es favorable, los precios de la tierra son bajos y hemos registrado ofertas desde $100.000 M2 en lote vacio hasta $390.000 M2 construido, alrededor del  sector de Mondoñedo en Zabrisky, estrato uno, lotes desde 1400 M2 hasta 26400 M2; Las vías de acceso son apropiadas para recibir materias primas, la topografía es conveniente para adecuar las instalaciones requeridas y el gobierno municipal de Mosquera es impulsador de la industria, por lo que ha establecido un marco de uso del suelo claro, con el cual se identifica plenamente el proyecto.

Las siguientes ilustraciones indican el flujo de planta propuesto:

Esta ilustración permite apreciar el esquema de distribución física de los equipos y maquinaria en la planta, junto con una representación que ubica geográficamente donde se realizan los diferentes procesos en relación con dicha distribución física.


A continuacion, nuestra oferta empresarial de productos y servicios:

· Generación y distribución de energía eléctrica.

· Servicio de disposición final de residuos especiales, según resoluciones 1297, 1457 y 6981 de 2011.

· Venta de acero recuperado 7204.20 y 7218.10 (chatarra ASTM65) al mercado nacional y extranjero.

· Venta de aceite combustible FO#6 o bunker al mercado nacional y extranjero.

· Emisión y gestión de bonos CER (Certified Emissions Reduction) en el mercado de Carbono.

Adicional a esto, realizaremos I+D para la estandarización, aseguramiento de calidad y final comercialización de otros productos y/o servicios como:

· Negros de humo.

· Carbones de Boudouard y grafitos sintéticos

· Destilación de aromáticos, Benceno, Tolueno y Xileno

· Oferta de servicio de calefacción/refrigeración por demanda.

Metas de la etapa:

  • Encargar un estudio de factibilidad, adelantado por graduados de la Universidad de Texas, asesorados por el Dr. Michael Webber.
  • Adquisicion del suelo en compra o leasing industrial
  • Construccion de reactores y equipos
  • Implementacion de planta piloto

Etapa III - Planta de generación TAURUS60

Entre un amplio abanico de opciones, fue elegida la planta de generación TAURUS60 por su planteamiento y diseño modulares, que conjugan a la perfección con las características de nuestra planta para el tratamiento de residuos sólidos; Este equipo es producido por Solar Turbines, una empresa filial de Caterpillar Inc.

Creo que podemos beneficiarnos mutuamente en la participación de este proyecto que genera altísima visibilidad debido a su espectro de aplicación e impacto, a su relevancia en temas de interés global, innovación, correspondencia con políticas nacionales de desarrollo sostenible, la propia visión corporativa de Caterpillar tal y como la presenta su CEO, el Sr. Doug Oberhelman, así como otros factores económicos, sociales y ambientales.

Nos vemos muy atraídos por la propuesta comercial de Caterpillar que pone al alcance de este proyecto servicios complementarios y herramientas tan importantes como el acompañamiento en mercados de carbono y renovables por medio de Cat world trade, servicios financieros por medio de Cat financing, que es muy interesante pues cubre rubros como ingeniería y adecuaciones entre otros, facilitando enormemente el delineamiento y posterior implementación del proyecto.

Buscamos confeccionar una propuesta técnica modular, con alto potencial de replicación, que pueda causar un impacto importante en cerrar la brecha entre las zonas conectadas y no conectadas del Sistema de Transmisión Nacional, con lineamientos a largo plazo, superiores a los 15 años de operación amparados en el marco normativo, creciente atención del público y medios,  la experiencia y calidad técnica y logística de Caterpillar y nuestra creatividad e innovación.

El equipo de generación eléctrica TAURUS 60 comparte las cualidades modulares de diseño de la planta piloto y de los reactores PANCHA3, los cuales se dimensionan para producir los 44.56 MMBTU/hr que la TAURUS 60 requiere para su operación, resultando en una planta modular compacta con una capacidad nominal de 5.7 MWe, flexible en cuanto al combustible utilizado, con tecnologías innovadoras de control de emisiones, altísima confiabilidad y seguridad.

Enlace del sitio de Solar Turbines®, y del equipo MPP TAURUS 60

Metas de la etapa:

  • Obtencion de financiamiento CAT financial
  • Integracion con MPP TAURUS60
  • Operacion y observacion
  • Preparacion de modelo de Replicacion

Esta solución no se enfrenta a saturacion del mercado, ya que el principal producto en oferta es energia electrica, que en una economia en desarrollo, siempre esta en alta demanda.Por medio del proceso realizado en los reactores patentados, se descompone la estructura quimica de las llantas usadas y es transformada en un combustible gaseoso que es de inmediato transformado en energia electrica, por medio de avanzados equipos comerciales de generacion de potencia, desarrollados por un reconocido fabricante a nivel mundial; De este proceso se generan subproductos de carbono en estado solido, que son procesados para ser puestos en el mercado como materia prima para la industria.Ahora es el momento de hacer grandes cosas con la ayuda de todos! Esta campaña me va a permitir construir los prototipos, la planta piloto y realizar la primera implementacion de un proyecto Waste-To-Power; Por eso, esta campaña se debe desarrollar en tres etapas, y contando con el apoyo tecnico y el financiamiento ofrecido por el proveedor, al final de la tercera etapa debemos haber logrado encontrar tantos colaboradores y tan comprometidos, que podamos hacer realidad esta empresa.Etapa I - Reactor PANCHA V3Hace décadas existe el concepto de pirolisis y es ampliamente utilizado sobretodo en la industria alimenticia; Varias empresas intentaron proponer modelos productivos empleando la pirolisis para obtener energéticos y materias primas a partir de materiales vulcanizados, específicamente llantas usadas, durante la década de los 70’s sin mayor éxito.  Actualmente, el grave problema social y ambiental que supone la disposición final de llantas ha renovado el interés de un pequeño sector de la industria en este nicho de mercado, y fabricantes Chinos se pusieron a la labor de resucitar antiguos diseños Japoneses caídos en abandono o cuyas patentes expiraron, para ofrecer plantas integrales para la pirolisis que aunque relativamente funcionales, son absolutamente obsoletas.Este diseño se aprovecha de las particularidades físicas de la materia prima, específicamente su capacidad de absorber energía radiante o índice de emisividad; Utilizamos energía radiante infrarroja para inteligentemente bombardear las moléculas de hidro-carbones presentes en las llantas desechadas y precipitar el proceso de pirolisis en mucho menor tiempo, con un manejo inteligente y eficiente de la energía, completamente eléctrico, sin combustión de energéticos fósiles o del gas sintético obtenido. Los reactores diseñados por nosotros no requieren de cámara de pre-combustión, blowers, etc. Su aislamiento refractario es liviano, pues aprovechando la diferencia en emisividad entre la materia prima y el contenedor de la cámara de reacción se minimizan las fugas de energía térmica por conducción y/o convección.De construcción liviana, y sin partes internas móviles, también ofrece flexibilidad superior frente a los diseños tradicionales, pues puede operar en atmósfera negativa o positiva, con diferentes medios oxidantes o inertes, permite la inyección de vapor para inducir perfiles de extrusión en moléculas de carbón activado, etc.He construido un prototipo a escala de la última revisión de diseño (PANCHA3) y realizado pruebas de operación simples que demuestran la aplicación práctica del concepto.Cada reactor o gasificador PANCHA3 tiene un consumo eléctrico de 18KWh, el planteamiento es modular, cada unidad procesa independientemente una tonelada de materia prima y pueden combinarse cuantas unidades se requieran. Actualmente el diseño de los reactores PANCHA3 y de la planta PIARS, así como los procedimientos de operación asociados a esta tecnología de pirolisis por medio de energía radiante IR cuentan con protección de la propiedad intelectual bajo la modalidad de patente de invención, bajo la jurisdicción de la SIC en Colombia y modelo PCT Internacional, con referencia Resolución 610 del 15 de Enero de 2015. Etapa II - Planta piloto, BalsillasAdelantándome al éxito por alcanzar en la primera etapa, quiero mencionar las principales características en cada una de las siguientes etapas; La construcción de la planta piloto para la recepción y disposición final de residuos sólidos especiales y/o peligrosos esta enmarcada dentro de las siguientes características:Ubicación geográfica: Balsillas - Zabrizky, Cundinamarca, Colombia.

Localizada en una zona de alto impacto, con uso industrial permitido, y otras empresas dedicadas a la disposición final en el sector, así como los rellenos sanitarios de Mondoñedo, esta ubicación es ideal para la construcción de nuestra planta piloto de tratamiento de residuos y generación/distribución eléctrica.
La construcción de líneas adicionales de 500KV como Bacata – Ancon sur y la reconfiguración de líneas como  Bacata – Mosquera o Mosquera – Nueva Esperanza asegura una infraestructura solida que facilite la comercialización y distribución de la energía producida.
La importancia de los planes de ampliación del Sistema de Transmisión Nacional está relacionada fuertemente con compromisos a largo plazo que el país ha adquirido por medio de acuerdos internacionales, y responde también a la agenda de impulso y desarrollo del gobierno nacional, por lo que se espera estabilidad y apoyo intersectorial que favorezca la implementación a larga escala y a largo plazo de estas soluciones, además de un gran potencial de replicar en diferentes mercados el impacto obtenido.
Estudio EEB 2012 - 2017
Estudio Distasa (Tasajero) 2012 - 2017
La adquisición de superficie para las operaciones de la planta es favorable, los precios de la tierra son bajos y hemos registrado ofertas desde $100.000 M2 en lote vacio hasta $390.000 M2 construido, alrededor del  sector de Mondoñedo en Zabrisky, estrato uno, lotes desde 1400 M2 hasta 26400 M2; Las vías de acceso son apropiadas para recibir materias primas, la topografía es conveniente para adecuar las instalaciones requeridas y el gobierno municipal de Mosquera es impulsador de la industria, por lo que ha establecido un marco de uso del suelo claro, con el cual se identifica plenamente el proyecto.

Las siguientes ilustraciones indican el flujo de planta propuesto:

Esta ilustración permite apreciar el esquema de distribución física de los equipos y maquinaria en la planta, junto con una representación que ubica geográficamente donde se realizan los diferentes procesos en relación con dicha distribución física.

A continuacion, nuestra oferta empresarial de productos y servicios:
· Generación y distribución de energía eléctrica.
· Servicio de disposición final de residuos especiales, según resoluciones 1297, 1457 y 6981 de 2011.
· Venta de acero recuperado 7204.20 y 7218.10 (chatarra ASTM65) al mercado nacional y extranjero.
· Venta de aceite combustible FO#6 o bunker al mercado nacional y extranjero.
· Emisión y gestión de bonos CER (Certified Emissions Reduction) en el mercado de Carbono.
Adicional a esto, realizaremos I+D para la estandarización, aseguramiento de calidad y final comercialización de otros productos y/o servicios como:
· Negros de humo.
· Carbones de Boudouard y grafitos sintéticos
· Destilación de aromáticos, Benceno, Tolueno y Xileno
· Oferta de servicio de calefacción/refrigeración por demanda.
Metas de la etapa:

Encargar un estudio de factibilidad, adelantado por graduados de la Universidad de Texas, asesorados por el Dr. Michael Webber.
Adquisicion del suelo en compra o leasing industrial
Construccion de reactores y equipos
Implementacion de planta piloto

Etapa III - Planta de generación TAURUS60

Entre un amplio abanico de opciones, fue elegida la planta de generación TAURUS60 por su planteamiento y diseño modulares, que conjugan a la perfección con las características de nuestra planta para el tratamiento de residuos sólidos; Este equipo es producido por Solar Turbines, una empresa filial de Caterpillar Inc.
Creo que podemos beneficiarnos mutuamente en la participación de este proyecto que genera altísima visibilidad debido a su espectro de aplicación e impacto, a su relevancia en temas de interés global, innovación, correspondencia con políticas nacionales de desarrollo sostenible, la propia visión corporativa de Caterpillar tal y como la presenta su CEO, el Sr. Doug Oberhelman, así como otros factores económicos, sociales y ambientales.
Nos vemos muy atraídos por la propuesta comercial de Caterpillar que pone al alcance de este proyecto servicios complementarios y herramientas tan importantes como el acompañamiento en mercados de carbono y renovables por medio de Cat world trade, servicios financieros por medio de Cat financing, que es muy interesante pues cubre rubros como ingeniería y adecuaciones entre otros, facilitando enormemente el delineamiento y posterior implementación del proyecto.
Buscamos confeccionar una propuesta técnica modular, con alto potencial de replicación, que pueda causar un impacto importante en cerrar la brecha entre las zonas conectadas y no conectadas del Sistema de Transmisión Nacional, con lineamientos a largo plazo, superiores a los 15 años de operación amparados en el marco normativo, creciente atención del público y medios,  la experiencia y calidad técnica y logística de Caterpillar y nuestra creatividad e innovación.
El equipo de generación eléctrica TAURUS 60 comparte las cualidades modulares de diseño de la planta piloto y de los reactores PANCHA3, los cuales se dimensionan para producir los 44.56 MMBTU/hr que la TAURUS 60 requiere para su operación, resultando en una planta modular compacta con una capacidad nominal de 5.7 MWe, flexible en cuanto al combustible utilizado, con tecnologías innovadoras de control de emisiones, altísima confiabilidad y seguridad.
Enlace del sitio de Solar Turbines®, y del equipo MPP TAURUS 60
Metas de la etapa:

Obtencion de financiamiento CAT financial
Integracion con MPP TAURUS60
Operacion y observacion
Preparacion de modelo de Replicacion

story:
This image is the screenshot of the landing page for my site. It has been put on hold due to it being extremely complex in features which in turn means much expense.

My name is Jerryl (Owner), I live in the Philippines with my American husband and our 2 year old daughter. Life here is very hard and many like myself have found that earning online is often better than earning outside of your home. This is something my husband and I are very passionate about. We have a Facebook following of over 80,000 Filipinos over our 4yr period online. The reason we have that following is due to years of helping people earn online via online sales, coaching of good customer relations as well as marketing approaches.

This is our opportunity to take it to a higher level to not only give to the people of our country, but also to the world, while of course creating some stability for our family.

I myself have been a blogger on numerous sites that were "revenue share". Some sites are like carbon copies of each other which is one thing that will be drastically different about mine. The other issue is that some sites rushed in and had not figured out their payment algorithms nor how to best send funds to members globally. This in turn creates a lot of problems for them. We have all these issues sorted out. All we need now is to be able to fund it.

MY HUSBAND IS RUNNING THE PROJECT: SOME WORDS FROM HIM:

Blog Money Mafia is a project we have basically been sitting on for over a year now due to financial difficulties. It is not that the site being created is so overly expensive. More a matter of me being an American in the Philippines who is not a retiree and doesn't have SSS with a wife a baby is a very hard position to be in when it comes to making a living here that can support all of us.

The site has already been started but we have a long way to go. Right now we have a mock up of the landing page, there are still many additions to do here alone.

What is Blog Money Mafia? This is a social blog network where members of the site write articles that interest them, whether it is about their life, their beliefs, the news, entertainment... nearly anything you can think of. The traffic that activity creates earns revenue for the site via ads on the site. 50% of that revenue will be shared with members.

Blog Money Mafia​ podcast interview with Darla Hanger​ -
http://ebookpublishingpodcast.com/writing-opportunities-william-todd-interview/ 

Blog Money Mafia’s intent is to have a fun theme, to make this entertaining with fun related avatars as well as Mafia profile names (Ex - Tommy No Thumbs) and to basically think outside the box.  We do not have any affiliation with anything mafia related nor do we condone violence or illegal activity.  Participating in this themed site is in our opinion similar to watching a mafia movie or playing a bank robbers video game, it is merely entertainment.  If you do not feel comfortable with the name of the site or the use of the word “Mafia” we certainly respect that.

What makes this Social Blogging Network different?
A Treasure Chest of features!
We tend to be way out there when we do things, we look at what has worked well for some and what is lacking in other areas. A Social Blogging Site is like a combo (or should be) of articles, interaction between members and staff as well as FUN! (Unlike many generic looking sites we see that don’t stand out at all). We have many ideas for the site such as games, chatroom, groups, contests, emoticons, online or offline status, favorite’s lists, readers rating articles to encourage improvement or to validate their worth. Along with the Mafia theme itself which makes you feel like you are a character in a movie.

WHAT WE NEED:
We are asking for a contribution of $3,000.00 US. We are fortunate enough to have a developer who is also a friend who worked with HP for 15yrs who has all the skills to do this. He also lives in the Philippines and between the friendship and the cost of living here he has given us this bargain price.
What the money will be used for is very easily broken down into 2 parts.
1. Approximately $2000.00 for the site development and programming.
2. Approximately $1,000.00 for Business license, tax ID registration as well as the opening of a business bank account which requires at least $1000.00 to open.
Any additional costs if $3,000.00 is not enough should be small enough for us to cover.

WHATS IN IT FOR YOU?
Double Return Payback or
1 Year FREE Advertising Banner Ad (Approx. $1,200 value) with $100+ donation.

Blog Money Mafia site has no products to offer anyone so options to give back are limited to offering one year free advertising space (Approx. $1,200 value) with $100+ donation.

OR. A double your money return on your donation. I would happily draw up a receipt detailing what has been donated as well as what will be returned to you. The return payment would happen on a monthly basis as that is how advertisers pay the site and how the site pays the members. If you donate $5, you will be paid back $10 If you donate $1000, you will be paid back $2000.

Again, thank your for reading this and your time. This is truly one of the most humbling things to ask for help, a position I hate being in but we really want to see this happen not only for us but for the 1,000+ members waiting for this to begin.

PLEASE HELP US MAKE THIS DREAM COME TRUE!
